executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
IMPORTANT LOGIN INSTRUCTIONS:

The login page has TWO TABS: "Administrador" and "Vendedor"
- For VENDEDOR login: Click the "Vendedor" tab, then enter DNI (not username)
- For ADMIN login: Use the "Administrador" tab with username

TEST STEPS:
1. Go to /auth/login
2. Click the "Vendedor" tab/button (it shows a person icon and text "Vendedor")
3. Enter DNI: 94449838
4. Enter password: Alba1101!
5. Click "Iniciar Sesi√≥n"
6. If a modal appears with "Entendido" button, click it to close
7. Navigate to /dashboard/clientes
8. VERIFY: Button "Importar Masivamente" should NOT be visible (vendedor has no permission)
9. VERIFY: Button "Agregar Nuevo Cliente" SHOULD be visible

That's the complete test - just verify those two buttons.
